name: Neptune: Mission One
description:
The year is 2160, and martian archeologist Riley Clark has been tasked with finding out what happened to the missing explorer who disappeared on Neptune 100 years ago.

  • CONTROLS: 
    • WASD to Move
    • Mouse to Look
    • Alt+F4 to Quit
    • Full Controller Support: Left & Right Joysticks

  • CREDITS:
    • The Missing Explorer – Daniel Manoiu (www.manoiumusic.com)
    • Riley Clark – Sage Fremont (www.sagefremont.com)
    • Programming – Daniel Manoiu
    • Sounds & Music – Daniel Manoiu
    • Riley Clark Character Design – Sage Fremont
    • Neptune & Monster Design – Daniel Manoiu
    • Published By – BFLAT Interactive (www.bflatinteractive.com)
